name: receipt-wrangler
description: Receipt Wrangler is a self-hosted tool that scans and parses receipts into structured data. It supports email forwarding, OCR, and expense categorization.
features: OCR processing: Extract text from receipt images using optical character recognition technology.
Email forwarding: Send receipts to a dedicated email address for automatic import and processing.
Data extraction: Parse merchant names, dates, totals, and line items into structured database records.
Category assignment: Automatically categorize expenses based on merchant or manual rules.
Multi-currency support: Handle receipts in different currencies with automatic conversion tracking.
Expense reports: Generate summaries by category, date range, or merchant for tax preparation.
Receipt storage: Keep digital copies of all receipts organized and searchable in one place.
Manual editing: Correct OCR errors or add missing information through the web interface.
Export functionality: Download expense data in CSV or JSON format for accounting software.
Tag system: Add custom tags to receipts for flexible organization beyond categories.
Search capabilities: Find receipts by merchant, amount, date, or extracted text content.
Mobile upload: Photograph receipts with your phone and upload them immediately for processing.
